text:
Dr. John R. Kirk
University of Chicago
19 South Lasalle St.
Chicago 3Â» Illinois
Dear Dr. Kirk*
Thanks for your letter and your outline of the proposed
series on The Search for Certainty. I think these programs should
elicit considerable interest.
I am sending copies of the letter and the outline to
our Program Planning Committee, and I hope to have further comment
for you within a short time.
itwork Manager
